thread.title: Check Out the Coolest Companies that Celebrated at DC Fest! [Video]
thread.title_full: Check Out the Coolest Companies that Celebrated at DC Fest! [Video]

author: Christine Healy
title: Check Out the Coolest Companies that Celebrated at DC Fest! [Video]
text: SHARE Check Out the Coolest Companies that Celebrated at DC Fest! [Video] On September 15th, D.C.'s Coolest Companies partied at the Half Street Fairgrounds during DC Fest, a celebration of working hard and play TO SEND ANOTHER EMAIL CLOSE share On September 15th, D.C.'s Coolest Companies partied at the Half Street Fairgrounds during DC Fest , a celebration of working hard and playing harder in the District. Attendees enjoyed a night filled with live music, food truck bites, cornhole and networking with the city's best brands. One of the highlights of the night was the crowning of the 2015 Coolest Companies Competition winners . We received hundreds of stellar nominations from some of the area's most exciting places to work. With all of the awesome companies that came together for Fest, we wanted to highlight the unique company cultures of the nominees and winners alike. Check out the video below that takes you through our favorite end-of-summer fest and introduces you to the Coolest Companies in D.C. Check out the full list of 100 stellar finalists . C ongratulations to the 10 Coolest Companies for 2015: Aspire , Clarabridge , Brightfind , LMO Advertising , 2U , Capterra , Optoro , TrackMaven , VideoBlocks , EverFi . See more snaps from DC Fest here and check out our next DC Inno event, 50 on Fire (nominations open now!) Thank you to our event sponsors.
